message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $105. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit on this sale.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $110. I'm starting to think I should consider other buyers, but I'm still open to negotiations. Let's see if we can meet in the middle again.
